title: It took me three years to realize this...
body:
It took me three years to realize the facepaint on {{champion:245}} is in the shape of an hourglass...

smh

replies.body:
I love this!

Also the Zero Drive he carries across his back spins so fast that persistence of vision creates another hourglass shape within the glass(?) cylinder!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tybKgTUE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-17T03:06:39.983+0000)
>
> I love this!
> 
> Also the Zero Drive he carries across his back spins so fast that persistence of vision creates another hourglass shape within the glass(?) cylinder!

you mean his zero drive is actually not just an hour glass in a bottle? but actually a spinning non hour glass device that just looks like an hour glass while its spinning? so its spinning constantly? ive never seen it not spinning...

In the Ekko cg, "Seconds" at around 0:38, you can see the inner workings a little.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtEpp9lkfxA
Titles may change but the person is always the same.  ;-)
It took me 3 years to realize that he has facepaint
I only found out this week that the real name of Tails from the Sonic series, Miles "Tails" Prower is word play for "miles per hour".
I just noticed it now that you mentioned it.  Thanks!

OMG WHY HAVE I NOT SEEN THIS!
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Can you explain what do you mean? I actually don't understand lol

I took a break from League for about a year, when I cam back my friend who still played was showing me all the new champs over a call and I pointed out Ekko's hourglass facepaint and blew his mind that day too. XD
